Sequence of the command Change.label: SequenceChange
Sequence of the command Change.example:
// Sequence of the command Change

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
Message: Text=[CastName] ; Priority=1 ; Title=True
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim=MP_STEP_FORWARD
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 1 ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim=MP_STEP_BACK
EndThread
WaitMove: Char=Caster
EffectPoint: Char=AllTargets ; Type=Effect
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=Idle

Stona.label: PlayerSequence
Stona.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Stona

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
	EndThread
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=!IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_7}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_8}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_9}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: TargetLoop=True ; Chain=True ; Sync=True
		LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_6}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=False
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True
		PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True
		Wait: Time=10
	EndThread
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_9}; Reflect=True
EndThread
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_10}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_11}
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

ef100.label: PlayerSequence
ef100.body:
﻿// Player sequence of SFX Player_Attack_Zidane_Dagger

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_1}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=AreCasterAndTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToTarget: Char=Caster ; Target=AllTargets ; Distance=670 ; UseCollisionRadius=True ; Anim={anim_2}
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=4
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
	MoveToTarget: Char=Caster ; Target=AllTargets ; Distance=400 ; UseCollisionRadius=True ; Anim={anim_3}
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=!AreCasterAndTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToTarget: Char=Caster ; Target=AllTargets ; Offset=(0.0, 0.0, 1600) ; Time=0
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=0
	MoveToTarget: Char=Caster ; Target=AllTargets ; Distance=800 ; UseCollisionRadius=True ; Anim={anim_4}
EndThread
WaitMove: Char=Caster
StartThread
	Wait: Time=4
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_3}; MeshColors=(139,0,0)
        PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
	EffectPoint: Char=AllTargets ; Type=Both
	PlaySound: Sound=WeaponAttack
	StartThread: Condition=!IsAttackMiss
		PlaySound: Sound=WeaponHit
	EndThread
	Wait: Time=4
        WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_4}
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_5}; MeshColors=(139,0,0)
	EffectPoint: Char=AllTargets ; Type=Both
	PlaySound: Sound=WeaponAttack
	StartThread: Condition=!IsAttackMiss
		PlaySound: Sound=WeaponHit
	EndThread
	Wait: Time=4		
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=AreCasterAndTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; AbsolutePosition=Default ; Anim={anim_7}
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=2
	WaitMove: Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=!AreCasterAndTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; AbsolutePosition=Default ; Time=0
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=0
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_8}
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

StartThread
	Wait: Time=4
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX=Player_Attack_Zidane_Dagger

        PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_ATTACK

EndThread

// Player sequence of SFX Aero_Sword

Penance.label: PlayerSequence
Penance.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Penance

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
SetBackgroundIntensity: Intensity=0.5 ; Time=20
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
	EndThread
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True; MeshColors=(0.0,0.50,0.50)
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=!IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_7}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_8}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_9}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: TargetLoop=True ; Chain=True ; Sync=True
		LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_6}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=False
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True
		PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True; MeshColors=(0.35,0.05,0.50)
		Wait: Time=10
	EndThread
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_9}; Reflect=True
EndThread
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_10}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
SetBackgroundIntensity: Intensity=1 ; Time=20
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_11}
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

Thousand_Needles.label: PlayerSequence
Thousand_Needles.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Thousand_Needles

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
	EndThread
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=!IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_7}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_8}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_9}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: TargetLoop=True ; Chain=True ; Sync=True
		LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_6}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=False
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True
		PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True
		Wait: Time=10
	EndThread
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_9}; Reflect=True
EndThread
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_10}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_11}
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

Purge the wicked.label: PlayerSequence
Purge the wicked.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Purge the wicked

StartThread: Condition=CommandId != 57
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
	StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
		MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
		WaitMove: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
		Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
	EndThread
	Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
	SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
	Channel
	SetBackgroundIntensity: Intensity=0.5 ; Time=20
	ShowMesh: Enable=False ; Time=16 ; Char=AllNonTargets
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	StopChannel
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True; MeshColors=(0.6,0,0.2)
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
	ActivateReflect
	WaitReflect
	StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
		MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_5}
		WaitMove: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
	WaitTurn: Char=Caster
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
ElseThread
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
	Message: Text={text_2}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
	SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_6}; Reflect=True
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True; MeshColors=(0.6,0,0.2)
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True
	ActivateReflect
	WaitReflect
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
EndThread

	EndThread
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_ATTACK
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	StartThread: Condition=AreCasterAndTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
		MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; AbsolutePosition=Default ; Anim=MP_BACK
		Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=2
		WaitMove: Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=!AreCasterAndTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
		MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; AbsolutePosition=Default ; Time=0
		Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=0
	EndThread
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=Idle
	WaitTurn: Char=Caster
ElseThread

	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster

	EffectPoint: Char=Everyone ; Type=Figure

	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_ATK_TO_NORMAL
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; AbsolutePosition=Default ; Time=0
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=0
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_IDLE_NORMAL
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=Idle
EndThread
